title: Bridge Deficiencies Core Schema
description: Collection of schema definitions common to bridge deficiencies

mediaURLs.description: URLs for media such as images and videos related to the deficiency

onStructuralMember.description: Structural member on which the deficiency is present

boundingBox.description: A bounding box that includes the deficiency

depth.description: depth of the deficiency in the bounding box

closestElement.description: The closest element to the deficiency for reference

name.description: The name of the closest element to the deficiency

distanceFromDeficiency.description: Distance from closest element to the deficiency in inches
